statements: DELETE FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_name = 'Education Reform Act';

DELETE FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic' AND district = 'New York';
DELETE FROM bills WHERE bill_type = 'Revenue' AND bill_status = 'Passed';
DELETE FROM committees WHERE committee_chair = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' AND district = 'District 2';
